description: This file is a C++ source file implementing the core logic of the RDKShell plugin, including client monitoring, message handling, and interaction with Thunder controllers and plugin services.

classes.name: JSONRPCDirectLink
classes.description: A class that provides direct JSON-RPC communication with plugin services, allowing method invocation and response handling.

classes.name: StateControlNotification
classes.description: Implements notifications for state changes of plugin shell services, managing app suspension, resumption, and other lifecycle events.

classes.name: RDKShell::TaskQueue
classes.description: A thread-safe queue for managing tasks to be executed within the RDKShell context.

classes.name: CreateDisplayRequest
classes.description: A request object for creating display surfaces, including synchronization primitive for thread handling.

classes.name: KillClientRequest
classes.description: A request object for killing client applications, including synchronization primitive.

classes.name: PluginStateChangeData
classes.description: Manages plugin state change notifications and connection parameters, handling suspension and resume events for plugins.

methods.name: launchRequestThread
methods.description: Launches a thread to process a given RDKShell API request, dispatching calls based on request type.

methods.name: lockRdkShellMutex
methods.description: Attempts to acquire the global RDKShell lock with a try-lock mechanism, falling back to a blocking lock if needed.

methods.name: isClientExists
methods.description: Checks whether a client with a given name exists either in current requests or among connected clients.

methods.name: updateSurfaceClientIdentifiers
methods.description: Updates surface client identifiers for plugins to conform to RDKShell's display naming standards.

methods.name: toLower
methods.description: Converts a string to lowercase.

methods.name: ignoreResidentAppLaunch
methods.description: Determines whether to ignore launching ResidentApp based on factory mode and first-activation flags.

methods.name: handleInitialize
methods.description: Handles the initialization event of a plugin service, setting up display requests and plugins data.

methods.name: handleActivated
methods.description: Handles activation of plugin services, including special handling for ResidentApp and system services.

methods.name: handleDeactivated
methods.description: Handles deactivation events, marking applications as deactivated or crashed.

methods.name: handleDeinitialized
methods.description: Handles deinitialization events, cleaning up plugin data and requesting application termination.

methods.name: getLastWakeupKeyWrapper
methods.description: Retrieves the last wakeup key event, handling wake reason via Thunder controller calls and processing IR/BT wakeup sources.

methods.name: hideAllClientsWrapper
methods.description: Hides or shows all clients based on the 'hide' parameter.

methods.name: getScreenshotWrapper
methods.description: Sets a flag to trigger a screenshot capturing process.

methods.name: enableLogsFlushingWrapper
methods.description: Enables or disables logs flushing based on the 'enable' parameter.

methods.name: getLogsFlushingEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Retrieves whether logs flushing is currently enabled.

methods.name: showCursorWrapper
methods.description: Shows the mouse cursor.

methods.name: hideCursorWrapper
methods.description: Hides the mouse cursor.

methods.name: setCursorSizeWrapper
methods.description: Sets the cursor size specified by width and height parameters.

methods.name: getCursorSizeWrapper
methods.description: Retrieves the current cursor size.

methods.name: ignoreKeyInputsWrapper
methods.description: Enables or disables ignoring key inputs.

methods.name: enableInputEventsWrapper
methods.description: Enables or disables input events for specified clients.

methods.name: keyRepeatConfigWrapper
methods.description: Configures key repeat settings including enablement, initial delay, and repeat interval.

methods.name: getGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Gets the current graphics frame rate.

methods.name: setGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Sets the graphics frame rate.

methods.name: getBlockedAVApplicationsWrapper
methods.description: Retrieves the list of blocked AV applications if ERM is enabled.

methods.name: setAVBlockedWrapper
methods.description: Blocks or unblocks AV applications based on provided callsign list.

methods.name: hibernateWrapper
methods.description: Hibernates a specified application if conditions permit, involving Thunder controller communication.

methods.name: restoreWrapper
methods.description: Restores (activates) a specified application.

methods.name: notify
methods.description: Sends a notification event with given name and parameters.

methods.name: checkForBootupFactoryAppLaunch
methods.description: Checks persistent store for AgingState or FactoryMode to decide on launching factory apps.

methods.name: killAllApps
methods.description: Kills all active applications, optionally sending onWillDestroy events before destruction.

methods.name: setAVBlocked
methods.description: Sets blocking state for AV based on callsign.

methods.name: getBlockedAVApplications
methods.description: Returns list of applications currently blocked.

methods.name: moveToFront
methods.description: Brings specified client to front.

methods.name: moveToBack
methods.description: Moves specified client to back.

methods.name: moveBehind
methods.description: Moves specified client behind another client.

methods.name: setFocus
methods.description: Sets focus on a specified client, managing previous focused client, suspending apps, and focus notifications.

methods.name: getFocused
methods.description: Retrieves the currently focused client.

methods.name: kill
methods.description: Kills a specified client application.

methods.name: addKeyIntercepts
methods.description: Adds multiple key intercepts for clients.

methods.name: addKeyIntercept
methods.description: Adds a key intercept for a particular key code and modifiers for a client.

methods.name: removeKeyIntercept
methods.description: Removes a key intercept.

methods.name: addKeyListeners
methods.description: Adds key listeners for a client.

methods.name: removeKeyListeners
methods.description: Removes key listeners for a client.

methods.name: injectKey
methods.description: Injects a key event into the system for a specific key code and modifiers.

methods.name: generateKey
methods.description: Simulates key presses based on the provided key inputs.

methods.name: getScreenResolution
methods.description: Retrieves current screen resolution.

methods.name: setScreenResolution
methods.description: Sets display resolution.

methods.name: setMimeType
methods.description: Sets MIME type for a client.

methods.name: getMimeType
methods.description: Retrieves MIME type for a client.

methods.name: createDisplay
methods.description: Creates a display surface for a client.

methods.name: getClients
methods.description: Retrieves list of current clients.

methods.name: getZOrder
methods.description: Gets display list in Z order.

methods.name: getBounds
methods.description: Gets bounds of a client window.

methods.name: setBounds
methods.description: Sets bounds of a client window.

methods.name: getVisibility
methods.description: Checks visibility of a client.

methods.name: setVisibility
methods.description: Sets visibility of a client, with special handling for WebKitBrowser and focus adjustments.

methods.name: getOpacity
methods.description: Retrieves opacity level of a client.

methods.name: setOpacity
methods.description: Sets opacity level of a client.

methods.name: getScale
methods.description: Retrieves scale factors of a client.

methods.name: setScale
methods.description: Sets scale factors of a client.

methods.name: getHolePunch
methods.description: Retrieves hole punch status of a client.

methods.name: setHolePunch
methods.description: Sets hole punch mode of a client.

methods.name: removeAnimation
methods.description: Removes animations from a client.

methods.name: addAnimationList
methods.description: Adds animations from JSON array.

methods.name: enableInactivityReporting
methods.description: Enables or disables inactivity reporting.

methods.name: setInactivityInterval
methods.description: Sets inactivity timeout.

methods.name: resetInactivityTime
methods.description: Resets inactivity timer.

methods.name: onLaunched
methods.description: Event callback for application launched.

methods.name: onSuspended
methods.description: Event callback for application suspended.

methods.name: onDestroyed
methods.description: Event callback for application destroyed.

methods.name: systemMemory
methods.description: Retrieves system memory statistics.

methods.name: pluginMemoryUsage
methods.description: Get memory usage of a plugin by callsign.

methods.name: getKeyRepeatsEnabled
methods.description: Checks if key repeats are enabled.

methods.name: enableKeyRepeats
methods.description: Enables or disables key repeats.

methods.name: setTopmost
methods.description: Sets a client as topmost window.

methods.name: getVirtualResolution
methods.description: Retrieves virtual resolution of a client.

methods.name: setVirtualResolution
methods.description: Sets virtual resolution of a client.

methods.name: enableVirtualDisplay
methods.description: Enables or disables virtual display mode for a client.

methods.name: getVirtualDisplayEnabled
methods.description: Checks if virtual display mode is enabled for a client.

methods.name: enableVirtualDisplay
methods.description: Enables or disables virtual display mode for a specified client.

methods.name: getVirtualDisplayEnabled
methods.description: Checks if virtual display is enabled for a given client.

methods.name: PluginStateChangeData::PluginStateChangeData
methods.description: Constructor initializing plugin state change data with callsign, connection pointer, and reference to RDKShell.

methods.name: PluginStateChangeData::~PluginStateChangeData
methods.description: Destructor cleaning up plugin connection reference.

methods.name: PluginStateChangeData::enableLaunch
methods.description: Sets the launch enable flag for the plugin, indicating if launching should be enabled.

methods.name: PluginStateChangeData::resetConnection
methods.description: Resets the plugin connection pointer to null.

methods.name: PluginStateChangeData::onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handles the plugin state change event, notifying on launch, suspend, or resume as appropriate.

methods.name: showWatermark
methods.description: Toggles the display of a watermark overlay.

methods.name: showFullScreenImage
methods.description: Displays a full-screen image specified by a file path.

methods.name: onTimer
methods.description: Timer callback function for handling system power state subscription.

methods.name: subscribeForSystemEvent
methods.description: Subscribes to system events such as power state change using Thunder Controller.

methods.name: enableLogsFlushing
methods.description: Enables or disables flushing of logs to persistent storage.

methods.name: getLogsFlushingEnabled
methods.description: Retrieves whether logs flushing is currently enabled.

methods.name: showCursor
methods.description: Shows the mouse cursor.

methods.name: hideCursor
methods.description: Hides the mouse cursor.

methods.name: setCursorSize
methods.description: Sets the size of the mouse cursor.

methods.name: getCursorSize
methods.description: Retrieves the current cursor size.

methods.name: addEasterEggsWrapper
methods.description: Adds a new Easter Egg configuration based on provided JSON parameters.

methods.name: removeEasterEggsWrapper
methods.description: Removes an Easter Egg configuration based on its ID.

methods.name: getEasterEggsWrapper
methods.description: Retrieves the list of all configured Easter Eggs.

methods.name: enableInputEvents
methods.description: Enables or disables input events for specified clients.
